content.rendered: Tingkatkan sistem keamanan bangunan dengan memasang Panasonic CCTV NVR Panasonic 304K/G. Kamera CCTV adalah solusi keamanan untuk memberikan pengawasan jarak jauh meskipun anda sedang tidak berada di tempat. Untuk anda yang membutuhkan Panasonic CCTV NVR Panasonic 304K/G silahkan hubungi kami! Panasonic CCTV NVR Panasonic 304K/G memiliki kelebihan spesifikasi sebagai berikut: > Up to 4 channel with 1080p realtime live view > H.264 / MJPEG dual codec decoding > Max 200 Mbps incoming bandwidth > HDMI / VGA simultaneous video output > 4 channel synchronous realtime playback > Support 2 SATA HDDs up to 12 TB, 1 USB3.0 > Support 4 SATA HDDs up to 24 TB, 1 eSATA up to 16 TB, 2 USB > 4 PoE ports > Multiple network monitoring : Web browser, EMS* (E-Series Management Software) & Mobile-EMS* > Multi-Language : English / Thai / Vietnamese (E model : for Asia), English / Spanish / Portuguese(P model : for Central and South America)

excerpt.rendered: > Up to 4 channel with 1080p realtime live view > H.264 / MJPEG dual codec decoding > Max 200 Mbps incoming bandwidth > HDMI / VGA simultaneous video output > 4 channel synchronous realtime playback > Support 2 SATA HDDs up to 12 TB, 1 USB3.0 > Support 4 SATA HDDs up to 24 TB, 1 eSATA up to 16 TB, 2 USB > 4 PoE ports > Multiple network monitoring : Web browser, EMS* (E-Series Management Software) & Mobile-EMS* > Multi-Language : English / Thai / Vietnamese (E model : for Asia), English / Spanish / Portuguese(P model : for Central and South America)
